At the time when luminosity was prospering, he relied solely on mindfulness meditation.
It was purely through mind-nature meditation.
He should have responded to the various abilities of people.
That's why.
At one point, the disciples were swarming with dragons and fungus.
Even the Zugaru clan.
"This is the way the wind apparitions, spring branches, and joints work.
They cause those who see and hear them to be entranced.
None would fail to be enthralled.
However, it was no longer rumored that they were all ready to sleep.

source_sentence: 豈慈父欲子食藥而愈疾。
translation: Could it be that a loving father wanted his son to take medicine to heal his illness?
Did he then claim to have perished in another place?
